page.title: 17The Portman Hunt
page.content: Our survey showed that few people in the village are actually involved with horses, however those who are participate in hunting, racing, and horse shows. The Portman Hunt members come from all around, and Hazelbury Bryan can be judged as the centre. The hunt often goes through the village during the season which last from November to May, and most farmers cooperate. The Master of the Hunt issues a certificate to would be point to pointers which allows them to enter their horses in races at local meetings. The Portman Races are held at Badbury Rings. About six families in our 'D' block own race horses. Some also compete in the local shows including gymkhanas promoted by hte various hunts which include Blackmore and Sparkford Vale, South and West Wiltshire and South Dorset.
